projects.title: EquiSports
projects.description: This project showcases a responsive sports equipment website with animations and smooth transitions.EquiSports is a dynamic e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. It includes secure login and payment functionalities.

projects.title: TutorHUb
projects.description: TutorHub is a dynamic e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. It includes secure login and payment functionalities.

projects.title: Project 3
projects.description: Project 3 is a real-time chat application built using WebSockets for communication. It allows users to send messages instantly.
